product.name: Shower Curtain Rod, 1" Diameter Heavy Duty Tension Shower Rod, Non Slip Adjustable 28-74 inch No Drill Shower Curtain Rods Spring Tension For Bathroom, Shower Stall, No Rust, Brushed Nickel
product.bullet_points:
• 【Heavy duty】: Mcrbeay tension shower curtain rod is made of premium stainless steel, Compared to other shower tension rod, our 1" tube diameter and 0.7mm thickness provides better support and great stability.
• 【Non slip】: The adjustable shower curtain rod 2" base is designed with a non-slip pattern to provide better sassafras, and the adsorbent soft rubber pads can be applied to different wall surfaces without worrying about falling off!
• 【Stability】: Unique 1cm thick steel connectors for bi-directional non-bumpy connections skillfully distribute the weight more evenly to increase load carrying capacity. At the same time, you don't have to worry about snagging when moving the loop.
• 【Adjustable】: Mcrbeay shower rod tension Comes with Various Parts for You to Customized the Length You Desired between 28 and 74 inches, and you can easily install it to the wall in a short time.
• 【Easy to Install】: Mcrbeay shower tension rod can be repeatedly installed and removed .We provide the install step for installation ,so you can easily install the shower pole to the wall in a short time.
• 【Multi-purpose】: Our bathroom curtain rod can be used in Bathroom, bathtub, shower stall, room divider, window, RV, Closet, doorway, kitchen and so on!
